Interface DefaultUseCaseListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
FragmentIf
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAboutDialogFragment, AbstractDialogFragment, AbstractFragment, AbstractGridFragment, AbstractListFragment, AbstractLocalSearchFragment, AbstractPaginatedGridFragment, AbstractPaginatedListFragment, AbstractPreferenceFragment, AbstractSearchFragment, AlertDialogFragment, AndroidUseCaseListener, ChoiceItemDialogFragment, ContextualListFragment, DatePickerDialogFragment, DebugSettingsFragment, EmptyDefaultUseCaseListener, ErrorDialogFragment, FacebookAuthenticationFragment, FragmentHelper, GooglePlayUtils.DownloadAppDialogFragment, GooglePlayUtils.UpdateAppDialogFragment, GooglePlusHelperFragment, InAppBillingFragment, PictureDialogFragment, RefreshActionConnector, TimePickerDialogFragment, UseCaseFragment
public interface DefaultUseCaseListener

Default Use Case Listener

Method Summary
 void onFinishCanceledUseCase()
          Called when the use case finishes successfully but was cancelled during its execution
 void onFinishFailedUseCase(RuntimeException runtimeException)
          Called after the use case fails
 void onFinishUseCase()
          Called when the use case finishes successfully
 void onStartUseCase()
          Called before the use case starts
 void onUpdateUseCase()
          Called after the use case starts to report an update status if necessary
